oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Enhancing R&D in organic agriculture - with what type of learning?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seppänen, Laura
Francis, Charles
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 'Knowledge creation' is a metaphor for learning that deserves special attention when designing developmental activities for organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seppänen, Laura and Francis, Charles (2006) Enhancing R&D in organic agriculture - with what type of learning? Forskningsnytt om økologisk landbruk i Norden (2), pp. 5-6.
